metadata.title: CVE-2018-7999 on Ubuntu 21.10 (impish) - low.
metadata.description:
In libgraphite2 in graphite2 1.3.11, a NULL pointer dereference vulnerability was found in Segment.cpp during a dumbRendering operation, which may allow attackers to cause a denial of service or possibly have unspecified other impact via a crafted .ttf file.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo ua fix CVE-2018-7999` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

libgraphite2-3 - 1.3.11-2
libgraphite2-utils - 1.3.11-2
python3-graphite2 - 1.3.11-2
No subscription required

criterions.comment: graphite2 package in impish, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '1.3.11-2').
